articles.author: Joe Rossignol
articles.title: Spotify Preparing to Launch Long-Awaited Lossless Audio Tier on iPhone - MacRumors
articles.description: Spotify appears to be gearing up to launch its long-awaited lossless music tier.   Chris Messina (via TechCrunch) and Spicetify (via The Verge)...
articles.content:
Spotify appears to be gearing up to launch its long-awaited lossless music tier.
Chris Messina (via TechCrunch) and Spicetify (via The Verge) spotted new lossless references within the code for Spot… [+1380 chars]
